title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing (v.1.1.25 + 6 DLC) RePa
description:
The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing (v.1.1.25 + 6 DLC) RePack R.G. Catalyst



Info:



Year: May 22, 2013 Mr.
Genre: RPG, Rogue, Action, 3D, 3rd, Person
Developer: NeocoreGames
Publisher: NeocoreGames
Platform: PC
Publication Type: RePack
Game Version: 1.1.25
Language: Russian, Angliysky, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese
Sound language: English, Russian
Medicine: Present (ALI213)





Feature Repack:




* Based on the Steam version as of 11/08/2013 courtesy of PUNISHER'om
* Do not recoded / Cut video with no English subtitles
* Option to set different combinations of locations
* Option to not download the voice acting is not necessary (SoundsE.cst or SoundsR.cst)

DLC (using steam emulator from ALI213):
- Hunter Pack
- Treasure Hunter Perk
- Scenario Mode
- Blue Blood
- Thaumaturge
- Arcane Mechanic
- Installation time ~ 20 minutes
